alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:02PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL VALENCIA AND BERNALILLO COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM MDT... At 302 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Isleta Pueblo, or 10 miles northwest of Los Lunas, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albuquerque, Isleta Pueblo and South Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 143 and 154. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 209 and 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
